executeRepetiveUpdate

public int executeRepetiveUpdate()
Execute a prepared statement created using the createPreparedStatement method

Parameters:
leaveOpen - true/false Leave update statement open for furthur updates
You'll need to use the end method to clean up once you've completed all of the updates
Returns:
The number of records updated
